about_the_game:
Welcome to the year 2080! The number of unemployed and criminals is skyrocketing, but we won't let it happen. This is where Project SkyCop comes in - an elite unit of police officers who can take on anything.

A dangerous new mafia gang is spreading in the city, conducting its illegal business above the skyscrapers. Our mission is to stop this at any cost. Enter the futuristic world of SkyCop and face the challenge of saving the city from decay!



Prove yourself as a fearless warrior by equipping yourself with cool weapons from different eras and destroy your enemies in unique ways. Show off your fighting skills and face any challenge that stands in your way!



Discover your own personal game style and play according to your own rules. Use your favorite weapons and fight your way through the opponents. In this world, you have the freedom to shape the game according to your preferences and lead your unique strategy to victory. Let your creativity run wild and experience the game in your own unique way!
detailed_description:
Welcome to the year 2080! The number of unemployed and criminals is skyrocketing, but we won't let it happen. This is where Project SkyCop comes in - an elite unit of police officers who can take on anything.

A dangerous new mafia gang is spreading in the city, conducting its illegal business above the skyscrapers. Our mission is to stop this at any cost. Enter the futuristic world of SkyCop and face the challenge of saving the city from decay!



Prove yourself as a fearless warrior by equipping yourself with cool weapons from different eras and destroy your enemies in unique ways. Show off your fighting skills and face any challenge that stands in your way!



Discover your own personal game style and play according to your own rules. Use your favorite weapons and fight your way through the opponents. In this world, you have the freedom to shape the game according to your preferences and lead your unique strategy to victory. Let your creativity run wild and experience the game in your own unique way!
name: SKYCOP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and Keybord
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and Keybord

short_description: Welcome to the year 2080! The number of unemployed and criminals is skyrocketing, but we won't let it happen. This is where Project SkyCop comes in - an elite unit of police officers who can take on anything.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
